pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This scenic, static shot captures a coastal landscape on a hazy day. A large, green-topped sea stack sits in the turquoise ocean as waves crash around it, with a modern house visible on a cliff to the right. The only movement comes from the ocean waves and the slight sway of out-of-focus grass in the foreground.
